dcterms:creator: J. Cai
H. Zeng
H. Yong
Z. Cao
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: A real-world dataset of black-and-white old photos constructed using two methods: manually filling pixels and capturing images with different cameras. It contains 82 groups of images, including character and architecture types.
dcterms:title: OID-RW

dcterms:description: A multi-modal degradation dataset designed to simulate real-world image degradation scenarios. It includes various degradation types such as interpolation, CNN, GAN, and video degradation.
dcterms:title: MDD400
